statements: INSERT INTO User (id, username, password) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'password123') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username='john_doe', password='password123';
INSERT INTO User (id, username, password) VALUES (2, 'jane_smith', 'pass4321') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username='jane_smith', password='pass4321';
INSERT INTO User (id, username, password) VALUES (3, 'alice_wonder', 'qwerty123') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username='alice_wonder', password='qwerty123';
UPSERT INTO users (user_id, username, password) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'abc123') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username = VALUES(username), password = VALUES(password)
UPSERT INTO roles (role_id, role_name) VALUES (1, 'admin') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE role_name = VALUES(role_name)
UPSERT INTO permissions (permission_id, permission_name) VALUES (1, 'read') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE permission_name = VALUES(permission_name)
UPSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, password) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'password123')
